mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CREW( crew_id, member_id, crew_name, crew_goal, crew_title, crew_location, crew_sport, crew_gender, crew_frequency, crew_age, crew_date ) VALUES ( #{crewId}, #{memberId}, #{crewName}, #{crewGoal}, #{crewTitle}, #{crewLocation}, #{crewSport}, #{crewGender}, #{crewFrequency}, #{crewAge}, #{crewDate} );
